name: Radiation Man
description:
You have to defeat the enemies but you don't have an attack? Get close to the enemies to defeat them with radiation!

Download the both files and play locally.

Alternatively you can play at https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=31799

Since I didn't participate in GMTK 2017 I added a power up system fitting last year's theme. Each power up increases an attribute but decreases another.

Enemies change their behaviors when they take damage - police will be more aggressive, while bandits will run away.

See if you can surpass my score of 1480.
